ModMetaData.name: Metal Ain't Flammable

descriptionsByVersion.v1.1: This mod is a patch that makes Steel and Uranium non-flammable.

ModMetaData.description: This mod is a patch that makes Steel, Plasteel and Uranium non-flammable.
